name: Overcooked

task.description: Please wait while the game installs. This will take several minutes.
task.name: wineexec

content:
files:
- goginstaller: N/A:Select the Overcooked setup file
game:
  exe: drive_c/GOG Games/Overcooked Gourmet Edition/Overcooked.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win64
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    args: /VERYSILENT
    description: Please wait while the game installs. This will take several minutes.
    executable: goginstaller
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
